node.title: Man shot by Invercargill police appears in court
node.description: A man who was shot by police in Invercargill is facing a number of charges including assault with intent to rob.
node.content:
["A man who was shot by police in Invercargill is facing a number of charges following the incident on Saturday.", "", "
\nPhoto: 123rf.com\n
", "The 45-year-old man appeared in Invercargill District Court yesterday by audio-visual link.", "Police say he is charged with assault with intent to rob, intentional damage, possession of an offensive weapon, reckless driving, and driving while disqualified.", "He remains in a stable condition and has been remanded in custody.", "He is next due to appear on 28 March.", "Police are still wanting to speak to people who were in a black people mover which was travelling south towards Invercargill and was stopped near the incident.", "Witnesses to the incident with information to share can call 105 and quote file number 220319/2126."]
